content: spa day facecloth every day can feel like a day at the spa when you start your morning with this textured hand-knit cotton facecloth materials yarn 120 yards dk weight cotton yarn the better quality yarn you use the more luxurious your facecloth will feel needles us size 6 needles misc 2 stitch markers tapestry needle directions cast on 53 stitches work 3 row in seed stitch here is an excellent tutorial on how to knit seed stitch https //www knittinghelp com/video/play/seed-stitch-english 1 row 1 right side work first 3 stitches in seed stitch place marker pm k to last 3 stitches pm work last 3 stitches in seed stitch row 2 work first 3 stitches in seed stitch slip marker sm p to last 3 stitches sm seed stitch row 3 work first 3 stitches in seed stitch sm p2 k1 to last 5 stitches p2 sm work last 3 stitches in seed stitch row 4 work first 3 stitches in seed stitch sm k2 p1 to last 5 stitches k2 sm work last 3 stitches in seed stitch repeat row 1-4 17 times repeat row 1 & 2 work 3 row in seed stitch bind off loosely in pattern weave in ends if you want to use worsted weight yarn for this pattern use size 7 needles cast on 44 stitches and knit 14 repeats copyrighted 2010 2023 by anne mancine 2
